name: Old dusty tabletop game
description:
You are the minifigure from old tabletop game. Nobody touch this box for many years. Everyone in this box lost sanity or die, and only your friend Bandit and (maybe) you didn't fall into madness. But today you understand, the only way to better world is death. You kill Bandit and before his death he gives deck of cards and his favourites dices and ask two favors: "play" by the old rules to prove that you kept your sanity and meet him as soon as posible.

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam.
